annotation.spannedText: Vaccines face a tougher safety standard than most pharmaceutical products because they are given to healthy people, often children

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines face a tougher safety standard than most pharmaceutical products because they are given to healthy people, often children

annotation.spannedText: vaccines do carry risks, ranging from rashes or tenderness at the site of injection to fever-associated seizures called febrile convulsions and dangerous infections in those with compromised immune systems

classMention.mentionClass: vaccines do carry risks, ranging from rashes or tenderness at the site of injection to fever-associated seizures called febrile convulsions and dangerous infections in those with compromised immune systems

annotation.spannedText: Serious problems are rare, so it is hard to prove that a vaccine causes them

classMention.mentionClass: Serious problems are rare, so it is hard to prove that a vaccine causes them

annotation.spannedText: such work is necessary to maintain public trust

classMention.mentionClass: such work is necessary to maintain public trust

annotation.spannedText: Neal Halsey, a paediatrician at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health in Baltimore, Maryland

classMention.mentionClass: Neal Halsey, a paediatrician at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health in Baltimore, Maryland

annotation.spannedText: If we don't do the research, there will be more people who don't believe in vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: If we don't do the research, there will be more people who don't believe in vaccines

annotation.spannedText: Technological advances have made modern vaccines purer and safer than their historical counterparts

classMention.mentionClass: Technological advances have made modern vaccines purer and safer than their historical counterparts

annotation.spannedText: the widely communicated concern has caused more harm than it intended to prevent

classMention.mentionClass: the widely communicated concern has caused more harm than it intended to prevent

annotation.spannedText: no one cares, and it takes years to build up the trust again

classMention.mentionClass: no one cares, and it takes years to build up the trust again

annotation.spannedText: Bonhoeffer

classMention.mentionClass: Bonhoeffer

annotation.spannedText: Even if surveillance efforts became faster and more thorough, public-health officials still need to make quick decisions with incomplete data

classMention.mentionClass: Even if surveillance efforts became faster and more thorough, public-health officials still need to make quick decisions with incomplete data

annotation.spannedText: Suspending a vaccine tends to get more media attention than resuming one ... so people remember only the threat

classMention.mentionClass: Suspending a vaccine tends to get more media attention than resuming one ... so people remember only the threat

annotation.spannedText: Pier Luigi Lopalco, head of the vaccine-preventable-diseases programme at the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control in Solna, Sweden

classMention.mentionClass: Pier Luigi Lopalco, head of the vaccine-preventable-diseases programme at the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control in Solna, Sweden

annotation.spannedText: Some speculate that children with metabolic disorders might be prone to vaccine side effects, but two studies published in April suggest otherwise

classMention.mentionClass: Some speculate that children with metabolic disorders might be prone to vaccine side effects, but two studies published in April suggest otherwise

annotation.spannedText: Researchers

classMention.mentionClass: Researchers

annotation.spannedText: Even if immunization does prove risky for certain children, withholding the vaccine could pose a greater threat

classMention.mentionClass: Even if immunization does prove risky for certain children, withholding the vaccine could pose a greater threat

annotation.spannedText: that the benefits of vaccines still greatly outweigh the risks

classMention.mentionClass: that the benefits of vaccines still greatly outweigh the risks

annotation.spannedText: as diseases recede from the public's memory, the population's tolerance for side effects will drop even further

classMention.mentionClass: as diseases recede from the public's memory, the population's tolerance for side effects will drop even further

annotation.spannedText: If you don't know the diseases and you haven't seen them, then you really aren't willing to accept any risk

classMention.mentionClass: If you don't know the diseases and you haven't seen them, then you really aren't willing to accept any risk

annotation.spannedText: Edwards

classMention.mentionClass: Edwards

annotation.spannedText: eliminating risk is impossible

classMention.mentionClass: eliminating risk is impossible

annotation.spannedText: We can never make them 100% safe

classMention.mentionClass: We can never make them 100% safe
